revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #40 Yache |image = [[File:Yache.png]] |caption = This Berry has a refreshing flavor that strikes a good balance of dryness and sourness. It tastes better chilled. This Berry slows the growth of nearby Berries. |growtime = 12h 0m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 1,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Yache''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Passho]] with all empty plots. The Passho will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour || 4 hours || 8 hours || 12 hours - 1 day |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:YacheTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:YacheTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:YacheTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (growth speed) | ||
x0.9 ||
x0.8 ||
x0.7 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 12 hours -
1 day || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 8 hours -
16 hours || 96 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 5 hours 20 mins -
10 hours 40 mins || 64 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Yache_Flow_Chart.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Yache berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] '''[[Passho]]''' |} ==Uses== ===Mutations=== Yache berries can be used to mutate the following berries. {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- !
